summary: The Super Bowl is the biggest game in American football, deciding the NFL champion. The first Super Bowl, called the AFL-NFL World Championship Game, was won by the Packers over the Chiefs. The game is usually held in warm-weather cities or domed stadiums and features the champions of the AFC and NFC. The Miami Dolphins are the only team to have a perfect season, winning all their games including Super Bowl VII. Some teams have hosted the Super Bowl at their home stadiums, like the Tampa Bay Buccaneers and the Los Angeles Rams.
title: List of Super Bowl champions
